section.title: Internet Explorer / Edge
section.p: Sorry, no support - YET. This should in principle be possible since Windows 8. It requires a system-wite speller. We are working on it, but it has turned out to be harder than anticipated. We'll update the page as soon as we have news.

section.title: Chrome
section.p: Sorry - no support. Chrome uses Google's own spelling checker, which we don't have access to. And Google does not support the languages we are working on (please proove us wrong, Google!).

section.title: Safari
section.p: Safari uses the OS-wide spelling service in OSX. See the download options on the page for OS-wide spelling checkers.

section.title: Firefox
section.p: There are actually two sets of Firefox spelling plugins, one made by Tino Didriksen, and another built using Mozvoikko. The language coverage is different for the two, with some overlap.
